item.title: ðŸŸ¢ iCloud Contacts: Issue (resolved)
item.description:
Started: 06/12/2025 11:35 PDT
Ended: 06/12/2025 13:20 PDT
Users may have experienced a problem with this service.
Some users were affected
Affected Services: iCloud Calendar, iCloud Contacts

item.title: ðŸŸ¢ iCloud Calendar: Issue (resolved)
item.description:
Started: 06/12/2025 11:35 PDT
Ended: 06/12/2025 13:20 PDT
Users did not receive push notifications.
Some users were affected
Affected Services: iCloud Calendar, iCloud Contacts

item.title: ðŸŸ¢ Apple School Manager: Issue (resolved)
item.description:

Some users were affected
Affected Services: Apple Business Manager, Apple School Manager
